categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sharoleigh was a female Human Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War. Stationed on Nar Shaddaa, she learned that a Jedi Master was training Force-sensitives in the ways of the Force. When she feared that this could swell the ranks of the Jedi, and tip the balance from the Empire, she sent an Imperial-allied individual to the Jedi training facility to wipe them out.
